content.text:
Hello! I'm Claude Code, ready to help you explore this codebase and design implementation plans.

I can see we're in a monorepo at `/Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent` with some recent activity around:
- Desktop app configuration (Tauri)
- Website deployment preparation
- Agent settings and inference logic
- Gemini support implementation
- Core skills restoration

I'm in **READ-ONLY mode**, which means I can:
✅ Explore the codebase with Glob, Grep, and Read
✅ Use read-only Bash commands (ls, cat, git log, etc.)
✅ Design implementation plans and architecture
✅ Identify patterns and provide recommendations

But I **cannot**:
❌ Create, modify, or delete any files
❌ Run installations or system-changing commands
❌ Make any file system changes

I'm warmed up and ready! What would you like me to help you design or explore?
